verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of the sons of Korah, set to Alamoth. A Song.) God <WH430> is our refuge <WH4268> and strength, <WH5797> A very <WH3966> present <WH4672> help <WH5833> in trouble. <WH6869>
Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> we will not fear, <WH3372> though the earth <WH776> should change, <WH4171> And though the mountains <WH2022> slip <WH4131> into the heart <WH3820> of the sea; <WH3220>
Though its waters <WH4325> roar <WH1993> [and] foam, <WH2560> Though the mountains <WH2022> quake <WH7493> at its swelling <WH1346> pride. <WH1346> Selah. <WH5542>
There is a river <WH5104> whose streams <WH6388> make <WH8055> glad <WH8055> the city <WH5892> of God, <WH430> The holy <WH6918> dwelling <WH4908> places <WH4908> of the Most <WH9411> High. <WH9411>
God <WH430> is in the midst <WH7130> of her, she will not be moved; <WH4131> God <WH430> will help <WH5826> her when morning <WH1242> dawns. <WH6437>
The nations <WH1471> made <WH1993> an uproar, <WH1993> the kingdoms <WH4467> tottered; <WH4131> He raised <WH5414> His voice, <WH6963> the earth <WH776> melted. <WH4127>
The Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> is with us; The God <WH430> of Jacob <WH3290> is our stronghold. <WH4869> Selah. <WH5542>
Come, <WH1980> behold <WH2372> the works <WH9282> of the Lord, <WH3068> Who <WH834> has wrought <WH7760> desolations <WH8047> in the earth. <WH776>

He makes wars <WH4421> to cease <WH7673> to the end <WH7097> of the earth; <WH776> He breaks <WH7665> the bow <WH7198> and cuts <WH7112> the spear <WH2595> in two; <WH7112> He burns <WH8313> the chariots <WH5699> with fire. <WH784>
"Cease <WH7503> [striving] and know <WH3045> that I am God; <WH430> I will be exalted <WH7311> among the nations, <WH1471> I will be exalted <WH7311> in the earth. <WH776>"
The Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> is with us; The God <WH430> of Jacob <WH3290> is our stronghold. <WH4869> Selah. <WH5542>
